file_content.text: Thanks to you, the Sith hunters are no longer a threat to Imperial interests here.
Moff Sarek received reports that the Advozsec mercenaries have been rooted out.
And you succeeded where my master failed--you destroyed the Jedi Master who trained those loathsome beasts.
Took everything I had to win.
Hardly a battle at all, really.
That's very... disconcerting. Was my master so weak? What legacy has he left me?
No self-respecting Sith should have had trouble with the likes of them.
Your master was a pretender.
Then I have learned nothing in my years with him. All that he taught me is false cowardice!
Take the payment for their deaths. My master clearly did not earn it.
It's no indictment of your master. It's just that I'm much more powerful.
They were very deadly.
Ah. Yes, the strength of your victory honors my master's memory.
I'm not getting into this.
I should not burden you with my personal sorrows.
Just hand over my credits.
I trust you'll find the reward to be quite generous.
My master is avenged, and the Empire is free to send more Sith to secure this world.
And if you meet any Sith who have lost their apprentices, perhaps... Never mind. It is my place to find my own master.
The alien mercenaries have struck again. Another Sith has fallen. I hope you destroy them soon.
You. Come closer. Let me get a better look at you.
My lord, I apologize. In my abject stupidity, I did not realize you were Sith. Please forgive this unworthy one!
You might want to get your eyes checked.
Are you blind?
I know I can never make up for such insult... but let me share with you a greater outrage that we have in common.
No offense taken, friend. What can I do for you?
Relax.
Your master shouldn't let you out before you've been housebroken.
Whose apprentice are you?
Sith aren't the forgiving type.
Don't think that'll work.
Then I will remedy my demeanor and hope my misstep can be overlooked.
So, it's all right to be rude to me?
Where's my apology?
No, you are quite right--allow me to begin anew.
Nice to meet a Sith with some manners.
How polite.
I know my station. Allow me to start again.
Yes. Yes, you appear to be quite capable. Exactly what Moff Sarek has bid me to find.
You can tell all that from looking at me, huh?
You want to check my teeth?
Assessing strength and capability in others is an essential survival skill among Sith.
I'm curious.
I appreciate your tolerance.
Make it quick.
I am Fannatex. I was apprentice to Sith Lord Mahish until he was struck down while searching for a Jedi in the employ of House Organa.
My master was ambushed in the mountains by a force of aliens--loathsome Advozsec. They were trained in special arts, and they slew him.
What kind of capabilities do these aliens have?
Special arts?
Resistance to the dark side of the Force. It's said that, defensively, they fight like--well, like Jedi.
An unfortunate loss.
It has stricken me greatly. My master was an exemplary Sith.
Your master must not have been very strong.
How embarrassing.
My master was strong with the Force! That only proves the magnitude of this threat!
I hear these mercenaries were specially brought in by House Organa to target and kill Sith.
If my master goes unavenged, they'll know their strategy is working. They will make Alderaan a deadly trap for any Sith who lands here.
It's my duty.
You are a shining example to me, my lord.
It's a good cause.
It is rare for we Sith to owe a debt of gratitude to one not of our kind.
I'll kill them all!
I feed off your zeal and vehemence.
Be warned, when my master perished, I felt him fall. And I felt the blow that killed him. It came from a Jedi.
Guard yourself well out there, for there may be true Jedi hidden in the ranks of these hired killers.
Not by me. [Reject quest.]
My master would kill you for thinking there is anything more important than serving the Sith.
Of course... he's dead. So, um, good luck.
Your presence can only bolster the Empire's cause.
You destroyed the foes who defeated my master. It must have been a terrible battle.
Of course.
You've also earned Moff Sarek's bounty for killing the Jedi. Had I been apprenticed to a true Sith and not a weakling, I could have collected it myself.
And you've earned Moff Sarek's bounty on the Jedi Master. The Republic should think twice about sending another.
